alert.note: Alert for Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pender and eastern Bladen Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 636 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms 9 miles north of Ammon, and 16 miles west of Clinton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Rowan, Penderlea, Carvers, Lisbon, Ammon, Lagoon, Rooks, Willard, Kelly, Ruskin, Wards Corner, Jerome, White Oak, White Lake, Atkinson, Watha and Bladen County Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 394. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
